law.text: Any taxicab company that operates six (6) or more taxicabs must accept scrip of a type approved by the City in payment for premium taxi service. Scrip shall be sold to eligible ART users in appropriate denominations. The charge in scrip for a trip taken by an ART user shall be an amount no greater than that indicated in the rate schedule rounded to the nearest multiple of twenty-five cents ($0.25). Any taxicab company which has less than six (6) taxicabs in operation is exempt from this division. (Ord. No. 1989-383, ยง3, 6-6-89)
